baseline_texts: The image shows a person with long hair wearing a dark-colored shirt. They are holding an open tube of cream or lotion, squeezing some out onto the back of their left hand. The person is positioned over a teal-colored surface, possibly a bed or blanket, with a plain wall in the background. The tubeâ€™s cap is open and appears to be white. The person's face is not visible.

The image shows a person with long hair wearing a black sweatshirt sitting at a surface covered with a teal-colored cloth. They are holding a white, open tube of cream or lotion in their right hand, with the cap detached and flipped open. The person's left hand rests on the cloth-covered surface. The background is a plain yellowish wall.

The image shows a person sitting at a table covered with a blue cloth. They are holding an open white plastic bottle or container in one hand, with the cap flipped open and facing towards the camera. The person is wearing a dark long-sleeved shirt. The background wall is a plain light yellow color.

The frame shows a person performing a yo-yo trick. The person is holding a white yo-yo, with one hand holding the yo-yo itself and the other hand blurred, indicating quick movement. The background features a bed with a blue bedspread, and the person is wearing a black long-sleeve shirt. The setting appears to be indoors with a yellowish wall behind. The image captures the dynamic motion involved in yo-yoing.

The frame shows a person standing or sitting behind a bed or a piece of furniture covered with a blue sheet or blanket. The person's upper body and hands are visible, and they appear to be holding and possibly rubbing or shaping a white spherical object, which looks like a ball or dough. The background includes a yellowish wall and a partially visible wooden door. The person's clothing includes a dark, long-sleeved top with some white text or logo on it. The setting appears to be indoors.

The image shows a person with long hair wearing a dark sweatshirt sitting in front of a teal-colored cloth or bedspread. The person is holding and appears to be manipulating or examining a white object with both hands. The setting seems to be indoors, with a light yellow wall and a wooden door in the background. The focus is on the person's hands and the object they are holding.

The frame shows a person holding a white ping pong ball in their right hand. Their left hand is reaching forward and appears blurred, indicating motion. The person is wearing a black long-sleeve shirt with a circular logo on the chest. The background wall is a light color, and the surface in front of the person is covered with a teal or turquoise fabric.

The image shows a person wearing a black or dark long-sleeved shirt. They are holding a white cylindrical object, possibly a bottle or container, in their right hand. Their left arm is extended forward and resting on a blue surface, which looks like a bed or blanket. The background is a plain tan or beige wall. The person's face is not visible in the frame.
